description: All agents have the same activity count of 17, which is unusual and may indicate a synchronization issue or lack of diversity in task distribution.
recommendation: Investigate the task allocation mechanism to ensure that tasks are being distributed appropriately among agents. Check for any synchronization issues or errors in task assignment logic.

description: API latency and throughput are both at 143.75, which is significantly higher than typical values, indicating potential performance bottlenecks.
recommendation: Conduct a detailed performance analysis to identify the root cause of high latency and throughput. Consider optimizing API calls, reviewing server load, and checking for network issues.

description: CPU and memory usage are within normal ranges, but should be monitored to ensure they do not increase unexpectedly.
recommendation: Continue monitoring CPU and memory usage to ensure they remain stable. Set up alerts for any significant increases that could indicate resource leaks or inefficiencies.

description: All compliance checks (security, performance, reliability) are currently true, indicating no compliance issues.
